attributes.action: create a function on the e-petition section of his website to enable people to show their opposition to (as well as support of) an e-petition, and create a comments box such that people can voice the reasoning behind their support/opposition. He may, of course, delegate these duties to a more experienced web-designer or programmer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Well... it's a rather good idea don't you think...
It would mean that the e-petitions would become more like mini-e-refurendums.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
